title: Find an auditor
text: Find an auditor Overview Jurisdiction Authorities Initiatives ADGM Academy Dispute Resolution A platform that offers limitless opportunities and paves the way for a brighter future Abu Dhabi boasts first-class infrastructure and unparalleled global connectivity, making it a premier international destination. Its exceptional qualities make it an ideal location to live, work, and conduct business. View available support options Some of our FAQ topics Getting started Foundations regime Resolution for incorporation Existing auditors New auditors ACCESSADGM Operating in ADGM Find an Auditor Operating in ADGM Auditors Find An Auditor Register of ADGM auditors If you are operating in ADGM and need to appoint an auditor, you can find a list of ADGM registered auditors, both firms and individuals, below. If you are required to submit audited accounts, they must be audited by an ADGM registered auditor. ADGM’s enhanced Auditor’s Framework came into effect on 1 December 2021. All existing ADGM registered auditors had until their annual renewal date to re-register under the new Framework. As of 4 November 2022, all ADGM auditors required to re-register under the new framework have successfully done so. The table below lists all the firms and individuals, namely Registered Auditors and Registered Audit Principals, who have successfully registered under ADGM’s new Auditors’ Framework. For the avoidance of doubt, only the below firms and individuals are permitted to carry out statutory financial audits of ADGM entities. The table also shows the Additional Permits held by the auditor (if any). ADGM Registered Auditors are required to hold Additional Permits if they are providing an audit opinion on ADGM public interest entities (including listed entities) and Financial Institutions (FIs). If you require assistance or have queries, please email RA@adgm.com where a member of the team will get back to you.
